name: Peg n Pug
description:
My entry into Pre-Made Jam 4. 

This is just a short game with only a few levels to demonstrate and get a working game. 72hours is not much time to produce a full game. but I gave it a shot. Enjoy.

WASD to move Peg.

Place/Remove blocks using right-click or right bumper on a gamepad

A or space to jump.

Guide the pugs to the safehouse within the time limit and without losing too many.

Controller support differs slightly in difficulty from mouse and keyboard and requires the player(Peg) to move around the map a lot more. It is a lot more fun to play when you master the controls.

If the web GL version on this page won't work for you, please try the windows download version below.
